screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .xmdeck file in Corel MindManager 22
screenshot.caption: XMDECK file open in Corel MindManager 22

description: MindManager allows you to create various types of mind maps, such as tree maps, Venn diagrams, and timelines, to organize, visualize, and share ideas and complex processes. For example, you can use MindManager to outline the process of migrating data to a new database.
Corel introduced the MDECK and XMDECK file types when it released MindManager 21 in March 2021. You can create slide decks to organize and store slides based on mind maps for presentation purposes.
In Windows, MindManager saves XMDECK files in the following directory by default:
